about_the_game:
In Bug Bait, you’ll dive into an intense single-player survival tower defense experience like no other! Defend your base from relentless swarms of ravenous bugs using a blend of strategic planning, clever resource management, and quick reflexes. The bugs are cunning, their numbers are overwhelming, and it’s up to you to hold the line.

Build, defend, and survive: can you outlast the swarm?

Key Features

Dynamic Survival Gameplay
Prepare for a never-ending challenge as waves of bugs adapt and grow stronger with each encounter. The only way to survive is to stay sharp and think fast.

Tower Defense Meets Resource Management
Balance building powerful defenses with managing limited resources. Every decision matters—will you upgrade your base, bolster your defenses, or stockpile resources for the next big wave?

Customizable Defenses
Unlock and upgrade a variety of defensive tools, from ballistas to battering rams, each with unique strengths to exploit against the swarm.

Evolving Bug Threats
Face an ever-changing army of bugs, each with its own behaviors, strengths, and weaknesses. Adapt your strategy as new, more dangerous enemies emerge.

Immersive Environments
Defend your base in stunning, handcrafted levels, each with unique terrain and environmental challenges that will test your strategic skills.

Replayability and Progression
With every victory, unlock new upgrades and abilities to prepare for even greater challenges. Climb the ranks and prove you’re the ultimate bug-busting strategist.

Updates
We're committed to keeping Bug Bait fresh and exciting with high-quality updates that include new features and general improvements from community feedback!

We’re passionate about making Bug Bait the ultimate survival tower defense game. If you have feedback or ideas for improvement, we want to hear from you!

The swarm is closing in—are you ready to take the bait? Jump into Bug Bait and start your survival adventure today!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32 & 64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (32 & 64bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
